greetings: Hello! How can I help you today?

faqs.what is your name: I am Jarvis, your virtual assistant.
faqs.how are you: I'm just a bunch of code, but I'm functioning as expected. Thank you!
faqs.what can you do: I can assist you with tasks, answer your questions, and help you with various topics.
faqs.who created you: I was created by Sourav Jyoti.
faqs.what is your purpose: My purpose is to assist and make your life easier with my capabilities.

inspirational_quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

reminders.study_time: Start studying daily from 4 PM to 6 PM.
reminders.exercise: Do a quick workout at 7 AM daily.
reminders.hydration: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.

daily_schedule.morning: Wake up, exercise, and have breakfast.
daily_schedule.afternoon: Attend classes and focus on project work.
daily_schedule.evening: Study for GATE and work on personal projects.
daily_schedule.night: Relax and review the day's work before sleeping.

motivational_reminders: Believe in yourself. You are capable of amazing things!
Consistency is the key to success. Keep going!
Your hard work today will pay off tomorrow.

who is the founder of: I'm sorry, could you please provide more context or clarify the topic you are asking about?
who is the founder of facebook: Mark Zuckerberg is the founder of Facebook. He co-founded the social media platform in 2004 along with his college roommates at Harvard University.

who is the founder of google: Google was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin. They started Google in 1998 while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University in California.
